pages.title: Hydra Chop
pages.text: A filling meal with just a single Hydra Chop. Eating this potent meat greatly satiates hunger and provides temporary rapid healing. Fitting for those that have conquered such a mighty beast.

pages.title: Maze Wafer
pages.text: Quick little snacks found in mazes. Though barely able to grant some saturation, it is perfect for exploring twisted landmarks when food becomes scarce.

pages.title: Meef
pages.text: Beef from a Minotaur. It's not very much if eaten raw, but cook it up and it is a valuable food item, rivalling the likes of Cooked Chicken.

pages.title: Meef Stroganoff
pages.text: Nutritious and hearty. Eating Meef Stroganoff not only empowers the adventurer but also allows them to enter the Fire Swamp safely without suffering from the heat. How kind of the Minoshroom after all that effort?
